title: of section 67 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, and reconstituted pursuant to the
heading: 1. (1) These Rules, which may be cited as the Rules of the Superior Courts
text_raw:
1. (1) These Rules, which may be cited as the Rules of the Superior Courts 

(Appendix I) 2025, shall come into operation on the 16th day of May 2025. 

(2) These Rules shall be construed together with the Rules of the Superior 

Courts. 

(3) The Rules of the Superior Courts as amended by these Rules may be cited 

as the Rules of the Superior Courts 1986 to 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) rule may cited rule superior court (appendix i) 2025 shall come operation 16th day may 2025 (2) rule shall construed together rule superior court (3) rule superior court amended rule may cited rule superior court 1986 2025

title: of section 67 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, and reconstituted pursuant to the
heading: 2. The Rules of the Superior Courts are amended by the substitution for
text_raw:
2. The Rules of the Superior Courts are amended by the substitution for 
Forms No. 1 and 2 in Appendix I of the forms bearing the like numbers 
respectively in the Schedule. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [149] 

O. 61, r. 2 

Schedule 

No. 1. 

NOTICE OF APPEAL TO HIGH COURT SITTING IN DUBLIN. 

_______ 

THE HIGH COURT 

Circuit No. .................................................... 

County of ...................................................... 

Between …………….A.B. ………………………………………...Plaintiff 

and ………………….C.D. …………………………………………Defendant 

Take notice that the defendant C.D. [or plaintiff A.B. or other person appealing] 
hereby appeals to the High Court, sitting in Dublin from the whole of the 
judgment of the Circuit Court given herein the ........... day of .............................,

NOTICE OF APPEAL TO HIGH COURT ON CIRCUIT 

[Heading as in Form No. 1]. 

Take notice that the defendant C.D. [or plaintiff A.B., or other person appealing] 
hereby appeals to the High Court on Circuit sitting at ……………….…...... at 
the next sitting thereof after service hereof from the whole of the judgment of 
the Circuit Court given herein, the .............. day of .............., 20 ……....., [or 
from so much of the judgment of the Circuit Court given herein the ….day of 
…………….., 20………... , as [set out the portion complained of]].

title: of section 67 of the Courts of Justice Act 1936, and reconstituted pursuant to the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These rules ensure that Forms 1 and 2 in Appendix I to the Rules of the Superior 
Courts comply with the terms of Order 61 Rule 2 of the said Rules of the Superior 
Courts as amended in S.I. No. 161 of 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 12 [149]
